mapper.select: SELECT f.*, iqs.title as target_title, iqs.description as target_description FROM interview_favorite f LEFT JOIN interview_question_set iqs ON f.target_id = iqs.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.target_type = 1 AND iqs.status = 1 ORDER BY f.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
